meanings.definition: マガダ語 (古代インドの言語)
meanings.english_definition: An ancient Indo-Aryan language spoken in Magadha, an area of ancient India.

examples.sentence: Magadhi was one of the Prakrit languages.
examples.translation: マガダ語はプラークリット語の一つでした。

etymology.value: Derived from the name of the Magadha region in ancient India.
